pages.text: $(bred)Snorkel Zombie$() always wears a snorkel, $(m)although zombies don't need breathe#().$(br)$(bred)Health$() : $(l)20$()$(br)$(bred)Eat Damage$() : $(l)Low$()$(br)$(bblue)Speed$() : $(l)Little Fast$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : It will dive into the water when swimming if the distance to target is far.$(l)It swims faster than walking$().
